section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: exp and expf calculate the exponential of x, that is, is the base of the natural system of logarithms, approximately 2.71828). You can use the (non-ANSI) function matherr to specify error handling for these functions.

section.title: Returns
section.p: On success, exp and expf return the calculated value. If the result underflows, the returned value is 0. If the result overflows, the returned value is HUGE_VAL. In either case, errno is set to ERANGE.
